Agreed Trevor!
I think teams need policies to guide them in their use of AI tools, especially when they first adopt them.
[Brian McKevier](/member/21) wrote a post on CMS Critic, recommending [teams create a Responsible AI Principles Worksheet](https://cmscritic.com/responsible-ai-principles-for-digital-marketing-and-content-teams) for their team or organization as they adopt AI into their business processes. It's a great way to help address the security concerns outlined in this article.
